definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: The papers that make it legal were signed at the time of the arrangement of the marriage.
sentences.chinese: 馬利亞和約瑟的婚書已在安排婚約時簽署。

sentences.english: As the marriage was taking place under the regime of community of property, the papers had been simple.
sentences.chinese: 婚姻採取的是夫妻共有財產製，所以婚書很簡單。

sentences.english: Get married with me when we love each other deeply, and get a marriage registration which will be admitted by a nation.
sentences.chinese: 在我們彼此深愛時結婚，並得到主權國家承認的婚書。
